amendment.description: Amendment added language to the text concerning the provision of humanitarian relief in Zaire.
amendment.purpose: An amendment calling on the government of United States to actively pursue an immediate agreement among the various parties in Zaire to permit the immediat and unhindered provision of humanitarian relief and the presence of international humanitarian workers to aid refugees and displaced persons.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
